environments.name: Forest Loner
environments.description: A peaceful forest diorama with tall trees, a winding path, and soft lighting. Perfect for exploration.

environments.name: Grandma's House
environments.description: A cozy cottage diorama with a warm atmosphere, garden, and charming details.

environments.name: After the Rain (VR)
environments.description: A stunning VR environment with wet surfaces, reflections, and atmospheric rain effects. Very detailed.

environments.name: Sea Keep - Lonely Watcher
environments.description: A solitary lighthouse or watchtower perched on coastal rocks overlooking the sea.

environments.name: Haunted Castle
environments.description: A dark, ominous castle with gothic architecture. Small but atmospheric.

environments.name: Hohenzollern Castle
environments.description: A majestic German hilltop castle with detailed architecture and grounds. Your current main castle.

environments.name: Castle Byers (Stranger Things)
environments.description: Will's iconic hideout from Stranger Things. Detailed scene with forest surroundings.

howToAddMore.instructions: To add more environments, download complete scene GLB files and add them to this catalog.

freeSources.name: Sketchfab
freeSources.notes: Search for 'diorama', 'environment', 'scene' - download as GLTF/GLB. Look for CC licenses.

freeSources.name: Poly Pizza
freeSources.notes: Free low-poly 3D models. Great for environments. CC0 licensed.

freeSources.name: Kenney Assets
freeSources.notes: Free game assets including complete scene kits. CC0.

freeSources.name: Quaternius
freeSources.notes: Free animated low-poly packs. Rivers, trees, buildings, characters.

freeSources.name: CGTrader Free
freeSources.notes: Filter by GLB/GLTF format. Check licenses.

freeSources.name: Three.js Examples
freeSources.notes: Some example scenes can be repurposed.

steps: 1. Download a complete scene/diorama as GLB format
3. Add an entry to this file with position, scale, and atmosphere settings
4. The environment browser will pick it up automatically
